short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds custom buttons to ChatGPT UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the user to add custom buttons for chat.
Each button inserts a predefined text into the chat input field and sends it.
Users can also manage the custom buttons through a settings.
